name: Name of The Will
description:
Welcome to Hope Everyone here wears the same outfit, lives the same repetitive routine, and is “happy”!

Name of The Will is a dark atmospheric 2D side-scroller set in a surreptitious futuristic world resembling Hong Kong.

One day, you wake up in a smiley headset at Hope, a residential building full of preposterous ordinances and neighbors with utter positivity. Something is weird in here, and you are to disclose the secret behind it. Dodge surreptitious governors and establish a rapport with the neighbors who monitor you. The price of truth might be intimidating. Your friendship, integrity and morality are on the list to sacrifice. On the journey of the truth pursuit, an absurd history begins to unfold itself…

Be prepared for a story-rich adventure in Name of The Will!
  1. Colorful hand-drawn 2D side-scroller where you can walk, run, jump, crawl, grab and climb in
  2. A puzzling narrative with dilemmas and tough decisions present themselves through your journey
  3. Dodge the secretive governors and learn your neighbors' stories to discover your past
  4. Your choices and actions will decide your neighbors' and your fate
  5. Original soundtracks fused with electrical soundscape and foley to establish a Hong Kong-based atmospheric vibe
Available language options:        

- 正體中文

- 粵語

- English
